programme.title: STV News
programme.desc: The STV National News covering all of Scotland.

programme.title: Scotland Tonight
programme.desc: Current affairs show tackling issues behind the headlines from a Scottish perspective

programme.title: The 1% Club
programme.desc: Lee Mack presents the ultimate leveller of a quiz show where it doesnt matter if youre not usually good at quizzes because the questions are all about logic and common sense.

programme.title: Shop on TV
programme.desc: Indulge in a world of incredible deals and must-have products.

programme.title: Its Showtime
programme.desc: Documentary. A group of working-class men buy a racehorse in a life-changing decision.

programme.title: Night Vision
programme.desc: Night Vision

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Nick is in the hot seat as he plays the game with just one question - join Stephen Mulhern to see if he navigates his way through the Bankers mind games or fall into a trap.

programme.title: Good Morning Britain
programme.desc: Martin Kemps daughter Harleymoon rates her dads performance so far on Im A Celeb, and we get the lowdown on doing Race Across the World with her brother Roman.

programme.title: Lorraine
programme.desc: Im A Celebrity star Angry Ginges best friends reveal all as he settles into camp; Hollywood star Adam Garcia on his exciting new role; and great winter dresses for under £20!

programme.title: This Morning
programme.desc: Magazine show with celebrity guests, entertainment, advice, competitions and features.

programme.title: Loose Women
programme.desc: Join the Loose Women team as they interview celebrity guests and discuss topical issues.

programme.desc: News bulletins from ITV News.

programme.title: STV News
programme.desc: The STV National News covering all of Scotland.

programme.title: Tipping Point
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz show in which three players take on an extraordinary machine in the hope of winning a cash jackpot.

programme.title: Lingo
programme.desc: Looking to spell success this time are Nigel from Norfolk and his mum Diana from Cheshire, friends Jane and Sue from West Sussex, and Ally and Cheryl from Nottingham.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern welcomes Aysha as she gets ready to take on the Banker and tries to beat him at his own game.

programme.title: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as four strangers - Merrick from Surrey, Amanda from High Wycombe, Andreas from Wolverhampton and Eileen from Prestwich - come together to take on a Chaser.

programme.title: STV News at Six
programme.desc: STV News from Glasgow and the West.

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITVs Correspondents.

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: April is shaken, Lewis tries to keep calm, and Charity continues to fume at Ross.

programme.title: The Martin Lewis Money Show Live
programme.desc: With Christmas 2025 fast approaching, Martin is back with his annual festive special in Manchester and is ready to arm viewers with the best Black Friday deals.

programme.title: Im a Celebrity... Get Me Out of Here!
programme.desc: Its time to head back to Australia as the celebrities continue to get to know each other while they settle into camp life.

programme.desc: Jenna joins Stephen Mulhern and hopes to be the one to go all the way to win a life-changing 100,000 pounds - all she needs to do to do that is beat the Banker.

programme.desc: Cathy from St Helens, Gerry originally from East Kilbride, Rachel from Chingford and James from London work together as a team as they face one of the countrys finest quiz brains.
